title: Assassin's Shortsword
content:
Quiet is the air around this sword, and quiet are the steps of the one who wields it.

Shortsword Light Finesse

Assassin's Shortsword is one of the Magic Weapon Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Assassin's Shortsword is a shortsword ideal for stealth-based characters or characters in need of stealth's utility.
